  ✖ Prefer optional chaining to manual checks.

    1 │ let foo = {};
  > 2 │ foo && foo.bar;
      │ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Safe fix

  - foo·&&·foo.bar
  + foo?.bar

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

 lint/js/preferOptionalChaining/reject/12/filename.ts:2 lint/js/preferOptionalChaining  FIXABLE  ━━━

  ✖ Prefer optional chaining to manual checks.

    1 │ let foo = {};
  > 2 │ if (foo) {
      │ ^^^^^^^^^^
  > 3 │   foo(1, 2, 3);
  > 4 │ }
      │ ^

  ℹ Safe fix

    1   │ - if·(foo)·{
    2   │ - → foo(1,·2,·3);
    3   │ - }
      1 │ + foo?.(1,·2,·3)
